QuestData.Title: A Very Nice Necklace
QuestData.Description: The beautiful necklace is only partly smudged by dirty hozen hands.$B$BThere's only one person in the Valley who would own such a beautiful piece of jewelry.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the necklace to Tina Mudclaw at Haohan's House or Halfhill Market in the Valley of the Four Winds.
